hero.title: Transform the way students learn math with Blueberry Math!
hero.subtitle: Dive into a unique educational experience with our space adventure: exciting challenges for your students and a complete transformation in how they learn math.

integrate.title: Integrate Blueberry into Daily Routines
integrate.description: Blueberry Math is a versatile tool that can be used at home or in school. In the classroom, dedicate a few minutes at the beginning or end of the class to reinforce what you've taught, or use it as a reward activity after completing other tasks.

consistency.title: Consistency is Key
consistency.description: Establish a daily routine, whether at home, in the classroom, or both, for students to practice math for 15 minutes a day, consolidating their key skills.

motivate.title: Motivate Through Game Narrative
motivate.description: Teachers guide students through topics that will be covered in the following week. Encourage them to complete missions as part of their learning and engage with the storyline.

dashboard.title: Use the Teacher Dashboard as Your Ally
dashboard.description: Review your students' progress at least once a week, identify those needing additional support, and plan personalized interventions based on the platform's data. Use progress and dedication reports to group students for peer-learning opportunities.

involve.title: Involve Families in Learning
involve.description: Share progress reports with parents at the end of each term to keep them informed and involved in their child's mathematical development.

evaluation.title: Fun Knowledge Evaluation
evaluation.description: Use in-class weekly practice sessions to review topics and conduct diagnostic assessments in a dynamic and collaborative way, tailored to your class's levels.

adaptive.title: Adaptive Progression
adaptive.description: Activities adjust to the student's level, keeping them challenged but not frustrated, ensuring they work through the curriculum at their own pace.

forgetting.title: Forgetting Curve
forgetting.description: Students review previously learned concepts to avoid forgetting and build strong knowledge.

realLife.title: Real-Life Contexts
realLife.description: Make learning more enjoyable and applicable by using scenarios students can relate to.

spaced.title: Spaced Practice
spaced.description: Algorithms ensure students revisit mastered concepts, promoting long-term retention.

gamification.title: Motivating Gamification
gamification.description: Game narratives and unlocked achievements stimulate curiosity and consistency in students.
